weekly_top_story.headline: International community intensifies aid and evacuation efforts as Cyclone Senyar devastates Indonesia and surrounding regions
weekly_top_story.summary: A powerful tropical cyclone and associated floods have killed hundreds and displaced thousands across Indonesia and neighboring countries in the past week, prompting large-scale international relief, emergency evacuations and urgent warnings about increasing extreme-weather risks linked to climate change

stories.headline: California storm triggers catastrophic floods and mudslides, killing at least two and prompting rescues
stories.summary: A severe Pacific storm produced torrential rain, flash floods and deadly mudslides across southern California in the last 24 hours, causing fatalities, evacuations and widespread damage while authorities conduct rescue and recovery operations

stories.headline: North Korea displays apparent progress on nuclear‑powered submarine construction
stories.summary: State media released images showing a largely completed submarine hull, signaling progress in Pyongyang’s naval program that could shift regional security calculations and accelerate concerns over the regime’s advanced capabilities

stories.headline: U.S. conducts strikes against Islamic State in Nigeria after attacks on civilians, officials say
stories.summary: U.S. forces carried out targeted strikes against Islamic State affiliates in Nigeria in response to deadly attacks on Christian communities, reflecting an ongoing counter‑terrorism campaign in West Africa with regional security implications
